org.jamwiki.search

Class RankingAlgorithmSearchEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jamwiki.search.LuceneSearchEngine
      • org.jamwiki.search.RankingAlgorithmSearchEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SearchEngine

    public class RankingAlgorithmSearchEngine
extends LuceneSearchEngine
    An implementation of SearchEngine that uses RankingAlgorithm to perform searches of Wiki content.

    • Method Detail

      • findResults

        public List<SearchResultEntry> findResults(String virtualWiki,
                                           String text,
                                           List<Integer> namespaces)
        Find all documents that contain a specific search term, ordered by relevance. This method supports all Lucene search query syntax.
        Specified by:
        findResults in interface SearchEngine
        Overrides:
        findResults in class LuceneSearchEngine
        Parameters:
        virtualWiki - The virtual wiki for the topic.
        text - The search term being searched for.
        namespaces - A list of all namespaces that should be searched when retrieving results. If this list is null or empty then all namespaces will be searched.
        Returns:
        A list of SearchResultEntry objects for all documents that contain the search term.
